titles.title: Miccosukee Reserved Area Amendments Act
Miccosukee Reserved Area Amendments Act
Miccosukee Reserved Area Amendments Act

A bill to amend the Miccosukee Reserved Area Act to authorize the expansion of the Miccosukee Reserved Area and to carry out activities to protect structures within the Osceola Camp from flooding, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 119-90.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 220.

committee.name: Senate Indian Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
